mapper.insert: insert into RENT_USERS values((select nvl(max(R_idnum),0)+1 from rent_users), #{R_id},#{R_password},#{R_name},#{R_address},#{R_phone},#{R_card},#{R_cardnum} ,0,'normal',sysdate)
mapper.update: update rent_users set R_password = #{new_password}, R_name = #{R_name}, R_address = #{R_address}, R_phone = #{R_phone}, R_card = #{R_card}, R_cardnum = #{R_cardnum} where R_id = #{R_id} and R_password = #{R_password}
